question: You want to book a hotel that one of your friends recommended to you for a family holiday at the seaside.Write a letter to the hotel manager to make arrangements. In your letter,explain what accommodation you require and when you want to stayask what will be included in the priceenquire about activities and places of interest near the hotel
text: I am writing to request your assistance concerning the matter of my booking at your hotel. One of my close friends suggested to me  your hotel, he also mentioned that his visit was quite pleasant at your place. That is why I have also chosen your hotel for my stay.

However, I would like to tell you about the room which I required. It would be spacious with at least 2 extra beds for my 2 kids. Besides, I will be arriving on the 12th of June and I need to confirm my booking for 3 days.So please, make my reservation from the 12th  to the 14th of June.

Furthermore, would you please also guide me about the details of your complimentary services which will be included in the price. Moreover, I would be grateful if you could send me the brochure which includes the details of nearby places and activities which I could enjoy during my stay.
Thank you in advance for your kind assistance

error_list.error_des: Consider using a question mark to signify that this sentence is a question.
